37.eng-name: Chapters on the description of the Day of Judgement, Ar-Riqaq, and Al-Wara'
37.ara-name: كتاب صفة القيامة والرقائق والورع عن رسول الله صلى الله

hadiths.text: Amr bin Shu'aib narrated from his father, from his grandfather from the Prophet (s.a.w) who said:"The proud will be gathered on the Day of Judgement resembling tiny particles in the image of men. They will be covered with humiliation everywhere, they will be dragged into a prison in Hell called Bulas, submerged in the Fire of Fires, drinking the drippings of the people of the Fire, filled with derangement

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About the Severe Threat for the Arrogant
